На сегодняшний день он собирается открыть свой бизнес по животноводству, но не оставляет свои прежние труды. Айнидин просит кредит в МДО "Хумо" для закупа скотов с целью начать свой бизнес и в скором времени увеличить поголовья скота на скотном дворе. Айнидин не боится трудности, и как сам утверждает, с легкостью сможет совместить все свои деятельности: растениеводство и животноводства, и в свободное время будет водить такси. Айнидину желаем успеха во всех его делах.
texts.en:
Aynidin is 38 years old. He is a versatile man. Aynidin was involved for several years simultaneously in crop production and providing taxi services to the residents of the J.Rumy region. Now, he is going to open a livestock business, but he will not leave his earlier works. 

Aynidin is requesting a loan from MDO Humo to buy livestock in order to start his business and will soon increase the count of livestock in the barnyard. 

Aynidin is not afraid of difficulties, and as he says, he will be able to easily combine all his activities: raising crops and livestock, and in his free time he will drive taxi. We wish Aynidin success in all his undertakings.

loans.use: to purchase calves and goats, to further increase his count of livestock in the barnyard

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon was born in Marimari village, in the Kiambeere region of Mbeere district.  He is married with two children.  Simon is a volunteer Community Health Worker in charge of hygiene promotion and water protection in the community.  He is also a peasant farmer with keen interest in supporting community health and mobilization.  He runs a small business selling home-baked buns that his wife makes to generate some income for the family.  He would like to buy a motorbike to support the community health workers in his village.  He will also use the bike for a taxi business in order to provide for the family.  "I am happy with this support and I hope my community will benefit from Kiva support and assistance," concludes Simon.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for Community Health Work

loans.name: Nora Ruth

texts.es: Nora se ha dedicado durante 15 años a ser comerciante independiente, ha tenido diversos negocios, pues desde que era joven aprendió todo el manejo de un negocio, pues le apasiona el tema administrativo. Hoy, a sus 53 años de edad, desea comenzar un nuevo proyecto productivo, quiere montar un asadero de pollos en un barrio popular de la ciudad, para lo cual ya posee el local, pero requiere el apoyo del crédito para comprar los activos fijos (congelador, mesa de aluminio, mesas y sillas), realizar adecuaciones locativas, hacer avisos publicitarios y comprar surtido al por mayor (pollos, gaseosas, papas, salsas, entre otros), de esta forma podrá poner en marcha su idea de negocio, en el que trabajará todos los días de 10:00 am a 8:00 pm y con el que espera generar ingresos adicionales para solventar los gastos familiares y para seguir abriéndose camino hacia el cumplimiento de su sueño que es fortalecer y acreditar su negocio, para que sea organizado, rentable y reconocido en el sector y que le permita generar oportunidades de empleo. Nora es consciente para lograrlo debe trabajar con esmero, dedicación y empeño, es la clave para tener la oportunidad de disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su esposo.
texts.en:
Nora has made a living for 15 years as an independent merchant.  She has had a variety of businesses.  She learned everything about managing a business when she was young because she's passionate about administration.

Today, at the age of 53, Nora wants to start a new business.  She wants to set up a rotisserie chicken business in a popular neighborhood.  She already has the space but she needs the help of the loan to buy the fixed assets (freezer, aluminum table, chairs and tables), make some modifications to the space, advertise, and buy supplies wholesale (chicken, soda, potatoes, sauces, and others).

This way Nora will be able to get started on her business idea.  She's going to work every day from 10 a.m. until 8 p.m., and she hopes to generate additional income to cover the family expenses.  She wants to continue moving toward realizing her dream of strengthening and getting recognition for her business so it's organized, profitable, and recognized in the field.  She also wants to be able to generate job opportunities.

Nora knows that to achieve this she has to work with care, dedication, and tenacity.  This is the key to having the opportunity to enjoy a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy fixed assets and supplies, to make modifications, and to pay for advertising

loans.name: Edmond

texts.en: Edmond is very appreciative to lenders for their help because he managed to buy the snacks and supplies for his vending machine. Now, he wants to do the same and so he needs your generosity again.

loans.use: To buy more vending supplies and snacks to sell.

loans.name: Mangdalena

texts.en:
Mangdalena is married, with four children. She is 47 years old. 

She has a coffee plantation and works five days a week. She began the business because the weather favors the business.

Mangdalena will use the loan to buy fertilizer. 

Her clients are village dwellers. She hopes to supply four tons of coffee. Her challenge is climate change which affects crop yields. She is hard-working and honest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Sandy

texts.es: Sandy   tiene 31 años de edad, esta soltero y vive con los padres. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de materiales, abono  para un invernadero de culantro y  hortalizas, el se dedica a esta actividad agrícola  y desea poder seguir creciendo con este proyecto y poder venderlo en los supermercados y lugares aledaños. El quiere aumentar un poco la producción y con ello  las ventas para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica a sus padres. El se ha dedicado con sus padres  al cultivo de hortalizas. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Sandy, 31, is single living with his parents.  He needs the loan to buy supplies and manure for his coriander and vegetable nursery.  He works in this agricultural activity and wants to be able to continue growing with this project to sell to supermarkets and nearby places.  He’d like to increase production a little and sales as well to provide better quality of life and economic stability for his parents.  He and his parents have worked growing vegetables.

This is the first loan he’s gotten from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans from state banks and Fudecosur has provided the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for his nurseries.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina tiene  23  años de edad, esta casada y vive con el esposo y dos hijos actualmente. Ella con crédito pretende comprar  insumos como abonos, fumigantes, y a su vez ayudarse con la mano de obra. Ella piensa dar mantenimiento a las plantaciones, para que este no sufra ningún daño, y no se pierda la producción, y así con su proyecto cafetalero poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja
texts.en:
Karina is 23 years old, married, and currently lives with her husband and two children. She intends to use this loan to buy supplies such as fertilizer and fumigants and in turn, to hire laborers. She plans to maintain her coffee plantations so they don’t suffer any damage or lose any production. This way, with her coffee-growing project, she can generate more income for her family. 

Karina doesn’t have the capital, resources, or money needed for said purchases; that’s why she is requesting this loan. This is her first loan from Fudecosur. She hasn’t had any other loans from state banks before, but Fudecosur has offered her this loan with better terms and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anaruth

texts.es: Anaruth tiene la edad de 50 años, está viuda y vive con tres  hijos actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de abono y dar asistencia a una plantación de café. Ella desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo para que este le permita tener una mayor producción y así tener mayores ingresos económicos. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Anaruth is 50 years old, a widow, and currently lives with her three children. She requires a loan to buy fertilizer for her coffee plants. Providing them with proper care will result in better production and increased income. 

Anaruth hopes to provide her family with a better quality of life in the future and greater economic stability. She wishes to grow both as a person and as a coffee producer. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR. She hasn’t had any loans with state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered her straightforward terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a thirty-year-old single mother of three children living in Kasese, Uganda. Three years ago she decided to start a retail shop in order to provide basics for her children. The high cost of rent and price fluctuations pose challenges to her business.  Jane's dream is to trade goods on a wholesale basis.  

Jane used her previous loan to buy general merchandise to sell.  She intends to use this loan to buy sugar, maize flour, millet and cassavas to sell.

loans.use: buy food products to sell

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.en:
Eugenia is from Duero, Bohol. She is 61 years old and owns a business as a vegetables dealer. She usually buy vegetables from farmers and resells for a profit. Her business has existed for 30 years now.  

As of this time, Eugenia is requesting for a loan to buy more stocks of onions, eggplants, tomatoes, string beans and other types of vegetables to sell. 

With this loan, Eugenia will be able to increase her stocks to attract more customers, thus giving her the chance of increasing her sales.

loans.use: buy vegetables to sell

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma is a 45-year-old woman from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married and has 7 children. Her oldest child is 23 while the youngest is 13.

Guillerma engages in fishing and catching crabs for an income to help her husband who is a fisherman.  She also sells fish. 

Guillerma is asking for a loan to buy bamboo, fishing nets and nylon.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business and increase business profitability for her children’s education.

loans.use: buy fishing equipment

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is 48 years old. She is married to a farmer and they have ten children who all go to school.  Marie has been selling foodstuffs for the past ten years. With this loan, she would like to buy more beans and bananas for resale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: buy beans and bananas to sell

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecelia owns a food vending business in her place in Talibon, Bohol. She sells snack foods like rice cakes and ice candies (popsicles). She also farms rice for a living.  Cecelia works hard to support her husband who is a carpenter in meeting the needs of the family. 

Cecelia is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, flour and sugar. With this loan, she will be able to do more while also providing for her family.   In the future, Cecelia dreams of expanding her business and making it a success.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and flour and sugar

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en:
Fatu is a 44-year-old business woman from Liberia.  She lives in the Sinkor area of Montserrodo County.  She is married and has 5 children between the ages of 1 to 19. Among her five children, four are attending school and they all live at home with her. 

For the past two years Fatu has been selling red oil in the local market.  Sometimes she makes less profit.  Fatu requesting a loan to purchase more red oil for her business.  She hopes to build a house in the future.

loans.use: buy red oil to sell

loans.name: Asaph

texts.en:
Asaph is a forty-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda.  He is a farmer and with the proceeds he was able to start a studio.  Price fluctuation and prolonged drought are his major challenges, and his dreams are to expand his farming activities, trade in produce and educate his children up to the University.

Asaph intends to use the loan to buy coffee seedlings for planting.

loans.use: buy coffee seedlings for planting

loans.name: Suzana

texts.en: Suzana needs your generosity again to stock up on inventory items for her variety store. The previous loan was for the same reason.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en:
Gregoria is 43 years old, married, and has six children. She is from the town of Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. Gregoria raises spring onions and tomatoes, which she has been doing for 21 years. 

Gregoria is requesting a loan for 6,000 PHP, which she will use to buy fertilizer, seeds, and a sprayer. This loan will help her sustain her business while waiting for the harvest season. Gregoria hopes that someday she can expand her business and improve the land that she cultivates for a better income. Any profit generated will be for her children's education and food for the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, and sprayer

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назира жительница района Хамадони. Ей 33 года. У нее есть муж и 5-летняя дочь. Муж Назиры работает мигрантом в России. Сама Назира у себя дома занимается предоставлением услуги швеи. Она принимает заказы на шитьё женских национальных платьев. Назира опытная швея. Ее стаж работы составляет более 10 лет. Она ответственный человек и когда получает заказы, она выполняет их в срок. Назира сейчас запрашивает кредит чтобы купить новую модернизированную швейную машинку, с помощью которой она смогла бы делать на платьях красивые вышивки. Естественно плата за шитьё таких платьев будет стоить дороже, что увеличит ее доходы.
texts.en:
Nazira is a resident of the Hamadoni region. She is 33 years old. She has a husband and a five-year-old daughter. Nazira's husband is a migrant worker in Russia. Nazira herself is engaged at home in offering sewing services. She takes orders for sewing women's national dresses. Nazira is an experienced seamstress. Her work experience consists of more than ten years. She is a responsible person and when she receives orders she fulfills them on time. 

Nazira is now requesting a loan to buy a new modernized sewing machine, with which she will be able to make beautiful embroidery on the dresses. Naturally, the fee for such dresses will be more expensive, which will increase her revenues.

loans.use: to buy a new modernized sewing machine

loans.name: Judithe

texts.en:
Judithe is 50 years old, married, and has two children. She sells beans and bananas, which she has been doing for 16 years. 

Judithe is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy more beans and bananas to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay for her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to purchase beans and bananas.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is 26 years old, married, and has one child. He runs a motorcycle transport business and a piggery. He operates in his local village. 

Christopher is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy more pigs. He hopes to pay tuition for all his children up to university.

loans.use: to purchase pigs

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.en:
Jacinto is 50 years old, married, and has one adult child. He is from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. He grows and sells rice, which he has been doing for more than 10 years. 

Jacinto is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy fertilizers and medicines and pay a laborer's fee to improve his harvest and augment his income. In the future, he would like to expand his farming business and increase business profitability as source of sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and medicines and pay a laborer's fee

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра из района Хамадони. Ей 48 лет. Она замужняя женщина с тремя детьми. У нее две дочери и один сын. Все ее дети, кроме одного уже закончили школу. Муж Гулчехры находится на заработках вдали от семьи. Гулчехра тоже зарабатывает на жизнь и вносит свой вклад в бюджет семьи. Она занимается предоставлением услуги швеи. Гулчехра начала эту деятельность 4 года назад, а научилась она этому делу у своих знакомых. Гулчехра принимает заказы на шитьё женских платьев у себя дома. На запрашиваемую сумму кредита она хочет купить новую швейную машинку, чтобы делать вышивку на платьях.
texts.en:
Gulchehra is from the Hamadoni region. She is 48 years old. She is a married woman with three children. She has two daughters and one son. All of her children except one have already finished school. Gulchehra's husband is earning money away from the family. 

Gulchehra also earns a living and contributes to the family budget. She offers sewing services. Gulchehra began this activity four years ago, and she learned this work from her friends. Gulchehra takes orders for sewing women's dresses at her home. 

With the requested loan amount, she wants to buy a new sewing machine in order to do embroidery on the dresses.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to develop her sewing business

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 31 years old, from the town of Jagna, Bohol. She is married with seven children, ages 2 to 13. 

For ten years now, Melanie has been farming vegetables for an income, like pechay (bok choy) and spring onions. 

She is asking for a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy seeds and seedlings of radish, carrots, chinese cabbage, potatoes, beans, and onions. 

Melanie works hard for her children. She hopes that, with her business profitability, she can earn more income and provide for her children's education. She dreams of becoming more successful in farming for her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings of radish, carrots, chinese cabbage, potatoes, beans, and onions.

loans.name: Minerva

texts.es: Para esta cosecha Mibnerva espera que su producción aumente a comparación del año pasado que fué de 10 tonelas, pues gracias a un crédito que obtuvieron por parte de Kiva pudieron resembrar parte de su terreno. Para esta cosecha ella solicita nuevamente de otro crédito el cual utilizará para comprar fertilizantes y el cual pagrá al final de la cosecha.
texts.en: For this harvest, Minerva hopes that her coffee production increases compared to last year's harvest, which was 10 tons. Thanks to a loan that they got from Kiva, they were able to replant part of their land. For this harvest, she is asking for another loan, which she will use to buy fertilizer and will pay back at the end of the harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: Manuela se dedica al cuidado de su hogar y a la producción de café. Aunque la mayoría del tiempo es su esposo de quien se encarga de la mayor parte de trabajo en el campo, ella conoce muy bien todas las actividades que allí se realizan. Ella es socia de la "Unión Regional" y allí entrega toda su producción de café para que sea procesada y exportada. Para la siguiente cosecha Manuela solicita un crédito para comprar fertilizante, limpiar su finca y pagar a cortadores de café que contratará.
texts.en: Manuela works caring for her home and producing coffee. Even though most of the time it is her husband who is in change of most of the work in the field, she is very familiar with all the work that goes on there. She is a member of "Union Regional" and that's where she delivers her coffee harvest so that it will be processed and exported. For the next harvest, Manuela is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, weed her farm, and pay coffee harvesters that she will hire.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pay harvesters, and weed her farm.

loans.name: Kulurukan

texts.ru: Кулурукан 55 лет, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитывает троих детей, а также ведет свое хозяйство. У Кулурукан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Кулурукан занимается животноводством, стартовав 29 лет назад, с покупки скота на 2,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кулурукан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 жеребенка, а также имеет 0,96 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картошку и клевер. Ежемесячный доход составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кулурукан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычка для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кулурукан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Kulurukan is 55 years old and a widow. After her husband's death, she has been raising three children and running her own farm. Kulurukan has a secondary education. The family's primary income comes from animal husbandry. Kulurukan started her farm 29 years ago when she purchased cattle with 2,000 KGS. Because of Kulurukan's hard work, her farm now has two foals and 0.96 hectares of a land share, which she uses to grow potatoes and clover every year. She earns a monthly income of 7,000 KGS. In order to further develop her farm, Kulurukan has asked the microfinance bank Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 30,000 KGS to buy a bull for cattle breeding. Kulurukan plans to invest money she makes from the loan to increase the number of domestic animals she owns and to save enough money to repair her house.

loans.use: buy a bull

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru: Сухроб молодой студент в возрасте 20 лет. Он проживает в городе Худжанд с родителями. Сухроб учится в Худжандском Государственном Университете. Он в будущем хочет стать программистом. Одновременно в свободное от учебы времени он работает оператором. Сухроб принимает заказы на съемок свадеб и торжественных мероприятий. Он занимается этим видом деятельности более 4 лет. Он успешно совмещает учебу с работой. В данный момент Сухробу необходимо оплатить за учебу в университете. Он просит в кредит 1200 долларов США - эта сумма годовой оплаты контракта. Сухроб будет очень рад поддержке. Ведь он так хочет получить высшее образование. Он уже планирует делать карьеру по своей специальности и в дальнейшем профессионально расти.
texts.en: Suhrob is a young, 20 year-old student.  He lives with his parents in the city of Khujand.  Suhrob attends the Khujand State University.  In the future, he wants to become a programmer.  Concurrently, he works as an operator during his free time.  Suhrob takes orders for filming weddings and celebratory events.  He has been involved in this type of occupation for over 4 years.  He successfully combines studies with work.  At the present time, Suhrob needs to pay for his university tuition.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 1200 US dollars, which is the cost for the annual tuition contract.  Suhrob will be very happy to receive the support because he really wants to obtain the higher education.  He is already planning to have a career in his speciality and grow professionally in the future.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition

loans.name: Dilovarsho

texts.ru: Диловаршо житель района Гиссар. Ему 40 лет. Он женатый человек, отец четверых дочерей и одного сына. Диловаршо 5 лет своей жизни провел на рынке, продавая мужскую одежду. Продажей одежды он научился сам. Диловаршо умеет общаться с новыми людьми и зарекомендовать свой товар в наилучшем виде. В течение 5 лет он многому научился и нашел немало постоянных клиентов. Сейчас в числе его товаров майки, брюки, футболки, бриджы и.т. Диловаршо берет кредит, чтобы закупить новую партию мужской одежды к осенне-зимнему сезону. Он надеется, что у него в скором времени будут в руках деньги, и он вскоре закупит новый товар. Приобретая новый товар, он приобретет много одежды и новых клиентов.
texts.en: Dilovarsho is a resident of the Gissar district.  He is 40 years old.  He is a married man and a father of four daughters and one son.  Dilovarsho spent 5 years of his life at a market, selling men's clothing.  He learned the business of selling clothing himself.  Dilovarsho can communicate with new people and recommend his merchandise very well.  He learned a lot and found many regular customers during these 5 years.  Now his merchandise includes tank tops, trousers, t shirts, pants, etc.  Dilovarsho is requesting this loan to purchase a new inventory of men's clothing for the autumn-winter season.  He hopes that he will soon have the money in his hands to buy new merchandise.  By buying the new merchandise, he will obtain a lot of clothing and many new clients.

loans.use: to purchase a new inventory of men's clothing for the autumn-winter season

loans.name: Ep2 Nyabushongo Group

texts.fr: Le client Sinyobewe est représentant  du groupe de crédit  des enseignants de l’école primaire « EP2 Nyabushongo », âgé de 46 ans et père de 8 enfants qui étudient. Son épouse est une commerçante de divers. Le client vit de son travail et il est confortable de sa carrière. Le nouveau prêt va lui servir d’améliorer son habitat  (paver sa maison). Ainsi, elle souhaite renouveler son prêt prochainement et renforcer l’activité de sa femme.  Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour son soutien en microcrédit aux enseignants.
texts.en:
The client Sinyobewe is the representative of the primary school teachers' loan group, "EP2 Nyabushongo." Sinyobewe is 46 years old, and the father of eight children who are studying. His wife is a merchant of various goods. Sinyobewe makes a living from his work and he is happy in his career.

This new loan will allow Sinyobewe to improve his living situation by paving his home. In light of this, Sinyobewe hopes to renew his loan as soon as possible, as well as helping his wife expand her business. Lastly, he would like to thank Hekima warmly for their support of micro loans for teachers.

loans.use: to improve his living situation by paving his home.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Moniuma

texts.en: Moniuma is 39 years old and lives in Sinkor. She is single and has three children between the ages of 5 and 17. All of her children are presently in school and live at home. Over the past 12 years she has been making and selling soap, which she sells in the local market. She enjoys her business a lot because she has  a lot of customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase oil and caustic to make soap. She hopes to send her children to quality schools in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase oil and caustic to make soap

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Desde hace 40 años Antonio ha producido café. Comenzó al lado de su padre quien tiempo después le heredó todos sus terrenos para que Antonio se dedicara de lleno a esta actividad. Antonio vive con su esposa, su hijo, su madre y otros 2 familiares. Además de producir café también se dedica a la producción de caña y trabaja en una empresa agrícola. Para la siguiente cosecha Antonio necesita comprar fertilizantes y realizar trabajos en su parcela y por eso solicita un crédito el cual pagará al final de la cosecha. Antonio tiene planeado que en 2 años su producción que actualmente es de 2 toneladas aumente a 4 toneladas pues ya ha hecho algunas labores en su finca para que esto sea posible. Después de la cosecha a Antonio le gustaría remodelar su casa para que él y su familia vivan más cómodamente.
texts.en:
Antonio has been a coffee grower for 40 years.  He started out alongside his father who in time passed down all his land to Antonio so that he could work full-time in this activity.  Antonio lives with his wife, son, mother and two other relatives.  In addition to growing coffee he also grows sugarcane and is employed in an agricultural firm.

Antonio needs to buy fertilizer for the upcoming planting season and to do field work on his land which is why he’s asking for a loan that he’ll repay at the end of harvest.

Antonio plans for his current crop yield of two tons to increase to four tons in two years for he’s done some work on his farm to make this possible.  Once the harvest is in, Antonio would like to remodel his house so he and his family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to weed his field.

loans.name: Gene Mae

texts.en:
Gene Mae is 23 years old. She is from the town of Jagna, Bohol. She is married and has two children ages 2 and 5. Gene Mae has been engaged in farming vegetables like pechay (bok choy) for five years now. 

Gene Mae is asking for a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy fertilizer, seeds, and a sprayer for her business. She is confident that with her hard work and additional inputs for farming, she can expand and improve her business. She also hopes that with her business, someday, she can also save enough to send her children through college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, and a sprayer

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза живет, работает и учится в городе Худжанде на севере Таджикистана. Ей 22 года. Она не замужем и живет с матерью, сестрой и младшим братом. Ее мать швея, сестра работает кассиром, а братик учится в школе. Сама Шахноза является студенткой Государственного Университета города Худжанд, экономического факультета. Параллельно Шахноза работает оператором базы данных в организации. Шахноза сейчас нуждается в кредите. Чтобы продолжить учебу в университете ей необходимо оплатить за контракт. Она будет выплачивать кредит за счет своей работы. Шахноза очень хочет получить высшее экономическое образование и в будущем стать хорошим специалистом.
texts.en: Shahnoza lives, works, and studies in the city of Khujand in northern Tajikistan. She is 22. She is single and lives with her mother, sister, and younger brother. Her mother is a seamstress. Her sister works as a cashier, and her brother is studying in school. Shahnoza is a student at the State University of Khujand in the department of economics. Shahnoza also works as a database operator for the organization. Shahnoza now needs a loan. She needs to pay tuition to continue studying. She will repay the loan with money she earns at work. Shahnoza really wants to get a degree in economics and work well in her field.

loans.use: pay university tuition.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto es un agricultor que lleve 20 años cultivando café.
el quiere constrir un establo para tener ganado con el fin de recolectar el estiercol que es la materia prima para las 9 camas de lombriz que producen abono organico. hasta ahora esta utilizando otro compuesto organico que se demora mucho en su preparacion diaria.
con un nuevo proceso de produccion de abono organico basado en la lombricultura podra dedicarse a otras tareas mientras se produce el abono independientemente. esto sera un paso escencial en la conversion a produccion organica en su finca.
sus metas como caficultor son ampliar su produccion y tener un proceso sustentable con respecto a las materias primas. tambien busca la posibilidad de proveer comida sana para su familia, eliminar venenos que puede afectar su calidad de vida, proteger al medio ambiente y demostrar a otros campesinos que la produccion organica puede funcionar.
texts.en:
Alberto is a farmer, and he has been growing coffee for 20 years.  He wants to build a stable in order to have livestock.  He will do this in order to collect the manure that is the raw material for the nine beds of worms that produce organic fertilizer.  Up until now he has been using another organic composition that takes him a lot of time to prepare daily.        

With the new process of producing organic fertilizer based on worm composting, he will be able to devote himself to other jobs while he is producing the fertilizer independently.   This will be an essential step in the conversion to producing organically on his farm.

His goals as a coffee farmer are to increase production and to have a sustainable process in respect to the raw materials.  He is also looking at the possibility of providing healthy food for his family, eliminating poisons that could affect the quality of life, protecting the the environment, and demonstrating to other farmers that organic production can work.

loans.use: to build a stable and buy livestock.

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en:
Abdullah is 28 years old, married, and has a child.  He lives with his family in Taiz, Yemen. He has always been a person who very much wants to get ahead and this has allowed him to overcome the great diversities life has presented him. 

Abdullah has been operating a grocery store for one year. At first, he started his business with his salary from working as a soldier.  Aiming to increase the variety of products he offers his customers, Abdullah is seeking a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. This will allow him to buy basic staple items such as soft drinks, sugar, mineral waters, and canned food to offer greater variety to his customers. In this way, he hopes his business will grow and consolidate within the sector and that his customers will find good service and a wide variety of products in his store.

loans.use: to buy basic staple items such as soft drinks, sugar, mineral waters, and canned food to offer greater variety to his customers.

loans.name: Vienney

texts.en: Vienney is 29 years old and he is single. Vienney sells different items such as soaps, sugar, and cooking oil. With this loan, he would like to buy more soaps, sugar, and cooking oil for resale. The profits from his business will be used for reinvesting.

loans.use: To buy more soaps, sugar, and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Jean Bosco

texts.en: Jean Bosco is 26 years old and he is single. He owns a boutique, which he has been running for the past four years. Jean Bosco has requested a loan to buy more boutique items such as sugar, soaps, and rice for resale. The profits from his business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, soaps, and rice for resale.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
William is a married man with three children, one of whom is in school and two of whom are underage. William lives in his own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food. 

For the past six years, William has operated a retail shop, selling to his neighbors and passersby. He mentioned seasonality as his major challenge. William dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With this KES 50,000 loan, he wants to purchase soap, wheat flour, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil. William decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business

loans.use: to purchase soap, wheat flour, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 51 years old, married, and has three children. Her eldest child is 23 and her youngest is 13. Cecilia has had a thriving Sari-sari (variety) store business for three years now in Talibon, Bohol, where she lives. She sells canned goods, chips, detergent, eggs, and noodles. She would like to increase her inventory, but has limited capital. 

Cecilia is asking for a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy rice, chips, biscuits, and canned goods. She hopes that in the future she can continue to sustain her business, improve her inventory, and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy rice, chips, biscuits, and canned goods.

loans.name: Anastasiah

texts.en:
Anastasiah is a married woman with four children, one of whom is in school and the rest of whom are adults. Anastasiah owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food. 

For the past five years, Anastasiah has operated a kiosk shop, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality as her major challenge. Anastasiah dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With this KES 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil for resale. Anastasiah decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es: Gabriela tiene  20  años de edad, esta casada y vive con el esposo y una hija actualmente. Ella con crédito pretende comprar  ropa como pantalones para mujer y hombre Ella piensa comprar ropa en grandes cantidades para conseguirla en un mejor precio. Ella piensa venderla a los vecinos y en lugares  y así con su proyecto de venta de ropa poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja…
texts.en: Gabriela, 20, is married and currently lives with her husband and daughter. With a loan, she intends to buy clothing such as men's and women's pants. She plans to buy clothing in large quantities to get it at a better price. She plans to sell it to her neighbors and in places and this way with her clothing-selling business, earn more income to contribute to her family. She does not have the necessary capital to make this purchase, since she doesn't have many resources and she doesn't have a way to get the money she needs for this. This is why she is asking for a loan. This is the first loan she has received from Fudecosur. She has not had previous loans from state banks, but Fudecosur has given her the loan more easily and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Laurence

texts.en:
Laurence is 62 years old. She is a mother of three children between the ages of 22 and 31. Only one of them goes to school, as the other two have already gotten married. 

With this loan, Laurence would like to buy more foodstuffs, such as bananas and sorghum, for resale. She plans to use the profits for paying school fees for her child. Laurence has very tiny eyes, so you might confuse her for a blind person, but she sees around everything.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs, such as bananas and sorghum, for resale.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David lives in the Kisii area of Kenya, which is an area that does not suffer from a dry season. David has no children and has been farming for five years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, and tea.

David says what he finds most enjoyable about farming is that it: "Makes him active and alleviates poverty." His biggest challenge is a "lack of funds." Animals on the farm have been given the names of "Chibirate."

David was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: "Low interest."  This client was also asked what he learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session, and he said: "To help poor."

His highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked 'How will this loan benefit your family?', David replied 'Will make me stable.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. David owns the following: "cow and poultry," but he does not own a "pig, pump, bicycle, motorcycle, or automobile." Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household a "mosquito net and solar power," but does not have "electricity, running water, sewing machine, TV, or DVD."

loans.use: To purchase a cow and a water tank.

loans.name: Maria Karina

texts.en: Maria is 27 years old and is married with several young children. Her husband catches crabs to sell at the market. Maria works independently selling clothes when she can. She has several clients and she goes to their home or business to sell to them directly. She first started out in this business when a friend gave her clothes to sell. Soon afterwards she began to sell clothes on her own by using catalogues and magazines. She is applying for a loan to buy more merchandise for some pants, blouses, and dresses to increase her selection. Once her business grows more, she hopes to open up a stall in the bazaar because she says it can be dangerous traveling by bus to visit her clients with her merchandise and profits from her sales.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Umarali

texts.ru: Умарали со своей женой живет в районе Хамадони. Ему 54 года. У него двое детей. Дочку выдали замуж, а сын работает в столице Таджикистана в городе Душанбе строителем. Сам Умарали 10 лет работает таксистом. Таксисты в Хамадони получают не много, потому что они в основном рассчитаны для простых людей. Для Умарали его доход достаточен, потому, что он работает только для себя и своей жены.  Работа таксиста является основным источником дохода семьи. На сегодняшний день машина Умарали нуждается в ремонте. Умарали хочет отремонтировать свою машину, но у него нет финансовой возможности. Он срочно нуждается в деньгах. Если у него будет финансовая поддержка, он починит машину и вернется к работе. Умарали будет Вам очень благодарен, если Вы его поддержите. Он нуждается в помощи!
texts.en: Umarali lives with his wife in Hamadoni. He is 54 years old. He has two children. His daughter is married, and his son works as a builder in the capital of Tajikistan, Dushanbe. Umarali has been a taxi driver for ten years. Taxi drivers in Hamodani don't make much money because they serve ordinary people. However, this income is enough for Umarali since he is only supporting himself and his wife. Taxi driving is the primary source of income for the family. Now, though, Umarali's taxi needs repair. Umarali wants to repair his car, but he does not have the financial means. He urgently needs the money. If he has financial support, he will be able to repair his car and get back to work. Umarali will be very grateful to you if you support him. He needs help!

loans.use: repair his taxi.

loans.name: Rouby's Group

texts.fr:
Nouvellement inauguré, ce 18 septembre 2013 ce banc villageois est composé de femmes désireux d’améliorer leurs conditions d’existence via des activités génératrices de revenu. Elles vivent dans un même village depuis plusieurs décennies et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles s’activent dans le petit commerce.

Madame Rouby, âgée de 32 ans (debout à droite), est l’emprunteuse vedette de ce groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de  trois  garçons et deux filles. Elle est vendeuse de savon, de condiments, bonbons et divers produits de consommation courante. 

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 02 grosses de savon à 4 500 F CFA, une à deux paquets de bonbon et quels que sachets d’assaisonnement pour la revente au détail dans le village et aux environs.
 
Avec  les bénéfices, elle développer son activité et participer de manière active à la gestion des charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Newly opened on 18 September 2013 this "banc villageois" (loan association) is composed of women who want to improve their livelihoods through income-generating activities. They have been living in the same village for decades and maintain relations based on solidarity and mutual assistance. They are active in small retail businesses.

Mrs. Rouby, aged 32 (standing on the right), is the featured borrower of the group. She is married and mother of three boys and two girls. She sells soap, condiments, candies and various basic goods.

With the new loan, she intends to buy two gross of soap at 4,500 CFA francs each, one or two packs of candy and a few packets of seasoning for retail sales in the village and surrounding areas.
 
With the profits, she wants to expand her business and actively participate in the management of family expenses.

loans.use: buy two gross of soap at 4,500 CFA francs each, one to two packs of candy and a few packets of seasoning for retail sales in the village and surrounding areas.

loans.name: Viana

texts.en:
Viana is a 23-year-old man with a wife. He is a businessman with two retail shops and a pool table in his trading center, something which he boasts
about because this is a great achievement in his life due to the benefits he has so far achieved through his retail shops. Alongside retail shops, Viana also does cattle fattening in the nearby village, which is also under his supervision, and he has diversified his sources of income by selling milk from the cows, as well as trading cows in weekly markets in his home area.

Viana has sought this loan in order to acquire some cows for fattening and also to add more stock to his retail shop. His main problems are the price fluctuation of cows and the high operation costs of running a shop, as well as high electricity bills. He appreciates the work done by UGAFODE, especially making it easy for him get access to financial support in the form of a loan and he wishes interest rates could be reduced.

loans.use: To buy cows for fattening and reselling, as well as to add stock to his retail shop

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: Desde que tenía 10 años Evaristo ha trabajado en el campo. COmenzó ayudando a su padre todos los días cuando salía de la escuela y fué así como aprendió todo lo necesario para convertirse años más tarde en productor de café. Toda su producción es de café orgánico y la entrega a la "Unión Regional", asociación a la cual pertenece y se encarga de procesar y exportar café. Para este año Evaristo solicita un crédito pues hace unos meses resembró parte de su finca y necesita comprar fertilizantes así como pagar a los cortadores que contratará para que lo ayuden a realizar todo el trabajo necesario.
texts.en:
Evaristo has worked in agriculture since he was 10 years old. He started helping his father after classes and learned everything he needed to become a coffee producer some years later. He produces organic coffee and delivers it to "Unión Regional", an association that process and exports the coffee and where he is a member. 

A few months ago Evaristo sowed a portion of his land. He is now requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and to pay the wages of the coffee cutters he plans to hire.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay coffee cutters' wages.

loans.name: Egya Kow

texts.en:
Egya Kow is a taxi driver in Domenase, which is near Cape Coast. He is a high school graduate. He is married and has three children. His wife works as a trader. 

Egya Kow has been working as a driver for close to 13 years. His income is used to help his wife pay the utility bills and their children’s school fees. 

He plans on using his loan to purchase spare parts to replace broken parts of his taxi.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts to replace broken parts of his taxi.

loans.name: Faith

texts.en: Faith is a single mother of 4 from Kamburi Village in Mbeere District, Embu county.  She is a volunteer community counselor and trainer in health and nutrition in her area.  She is an official in two self-help women's groups.  Recently, she was elected by her fellow women to lead the campaign on women's empowerment and mitigation on maternal health and gender-based violence awareness.  She says that with a motorbike, she will be able to reach more women faster.  She will also be able to generate some income for the time she spends doing community work since she is then unable to attend to her small farm.  Easier access to the remote areas will enable the community health workers to offer faster services to the hard-to-reach community members in the interior parts of her region.  “Kiva support will go a long way to touch on my community through the support I will get,” she adds.

loans.use: to purchase a motocycle to do community health work

loans.name: Nyame

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Nyame is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling fried fish in Domenase (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for eight years. 

Nyame is married and has three children. Her husband works as a coconut fruit seller. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. 

Nyame will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of fish, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Nyame plans to further diversify the types of food stuff (including fish) that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of fish, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.ru:
Основным видом деятельности в районе Хамадони является животноводство, потому что природа и климат позволяет вести такой бизнес без изъяна. Назокат не отстает от других жителей района, и зарабатывает на жизнь путем животноводства. Вот таким образом она уже 15 лет разводит крупнорогатый скот для продажи. Назокат замужем, ей 50 лет. Она воспитала четверых замечательных детей. У нее трое сыновей и дочь.   
Назокат идет вперед и берет кредит, чтобы продвинуть свой бизнес и закупить еще пару бычков. У Назокат большой опыт в этой сфере и большая вера в душе, что успех в бизнесе будет сопутствовать ей и дальше.
texts.en:
The primary occupation in Hamadoni is livestock breeding because the environment and climate are perfect for that. Nazokat is no different from other residents; she, too, earns a living by farming. Nazokat has been raising cattle for sale for fifteen years. Nazokat is married. She is 50 years old. She raised four wonderful children. She has three sons and a daughter. 

Nazokat is taking out a loan in order to promote her business and purchase a couple of calves. Nazokat has extensive experience in this area and a lot of faith in her heart that business success will accompany her from now on.

loans.use: buy a couple of calves.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.en:
Bernardo is a 56-year-old man from the town of Talibon, Bohol. He is married and has two children. He is a fisherman. He has also been raising hogs for five years now. He is asking for a loan of 16,000 PHP to buy piglets and feed that will last for a long period of time. Once the feed is available, he does not have to worry about buying it on a per-kilo basis, which is more expensive. 

It may take a few months for him to see his profit, but he is determined and works hard for his family's needs. In the future, he hopes to have a bigger barn with a sow and many piglets for better business profits.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Adjoa is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling soft drinks like malta, orange juice and coca cola in Mpeasem (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 40 years. Adjoa is married and has no children. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. 

Adjoa wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of soft drinks like malta, orange juice and coca cola. In the long term, Adjoa plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of soft drinks like malta, orange juice and coca cola.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy is married with four children. She has received a middle level education. Currently, Mercy sells African print cloth in Asebu (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this industry for about 10 years now.  Her husband works at the Ameen factory.  Mercy's income goes towards helping her husband pay for the family's general expenses.  Mercy will use the loan to buy more stock of her existing African print clothing, jeans trousers and others for sale. With the new profits from her expanded enterprise, Mercy plans to develop her business further by venturing into newer markets.

loans.use: buy more stock of her existing African print clothing, jeans trousers and others for sale.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Although she has received no prior formal education, Ama is an entrepreneur. She is a seamstress in Asafa (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this sewing enterprise for 40 years. Ama is married and has six children. Her husband is a pastor. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and to pay their children’s school fees. Ama will use the loan to buy more sewing materials like thread of different colours, lining, stiff and other fabrics to enable her to expand her sewing business. With the new profits from her expanded business, Ama plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to buy more sewing materials like thread of different colours, lining, stiff and other fabrics to enable her to expand her sewing business

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: У Фархода два славных ребенка. Им по 5 и по 2 года. Фарход свою жену и детей сильно любит и всем чем он занимается это ради них и их благо. Он работает таксистом. Более 4 лет он водит машину такси. Пока что это единственный доход семьи. В данный момент Машина Фархода имеет технические неполадки, и он сейчас не может работать. Чтобы починить машину он запрашивает кредит. После ремонта машины он сможет снова вернуться к работе.
texts.en: Farhod has two lovely babies. They are 5 and 2 years old. Farhod really loves his wife and children, and everything he does, he does for them and for their benefit. He is a taxi driver. He has been driving a taxi for more than four years. It's the family's sole source of income. Now, Farhod's taxi has technical problems, and he is unable to work. He is asking for a loan to repair the car. After repairing his car, he'll be able to get back to work.

loans.use: repair his car.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances Aba did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Aba sells charcoal and porridge in Asafa (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about 4 years. 

As a single mother with 2 children, Aba uses all her income to feed and provide for her family.  She will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of charcoal, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Aba wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: buy maize to make charcoal to sell

loans.name: Helena

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Helena is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling plantain and banana, and she also makes pastries in Nakwa (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 19 years. Helena is married and has seven children. Her husband works as a driver. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Helena wants to use her loan to buy more plantains and bananas and ingredients for making pastries to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of products. In the long term, Helena plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: buy more plantains and bananas and ingredients for making pastries

loans.name: Abena

texts.en:
Although she has received no formal education, Abena is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling provisions in Nakwa (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 21 years. 

Abena is married and has no children. Her husband is a fisherman. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses. 

Abena wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of provisions. In the long term, Abena plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the rising customer demands.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of provisions.

loans.name: Nadzua

texts.en:
Nadzua is a very hardworking and enterprising woman who says that she has been able to greatly increase her income and help her family, thanks to her hard work.

She is asking for a loan to purchase more goats for resale. She is grateful for the new support she has received.

loans.use: to purchase more goats for resale

loans.name: Ernestine

texts.en: Ernestine is 38 years old. She has four children who are between the ages of seven and eighteen. She has been in the business of selling animals for the past fifteen years. With the loan, she would like to buy more goats and chickens to sell. She expects the profits from her business to be used in creating savings, as well as paying for school for her children.

loans.use: To buy more goats and chickens to sell.

loans.name: Amanda

texts.en: Amanda is a 45-year-old woman from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is married with six children, ages thirteen to twenty-six. Amanda sells tobacco on the sidewalk for an income. This has been her business for thirteen years now. She is asking for a loan to buy more tobacco to resell. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and increase her profits to pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy more tobacco

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a married mother of four adult children. She owns a house that has no electricity or piped water. 

Joyce has operated a cereals shop as a retailer for the past ten years, selling to passersby and neighbors. She cited seasonality as her major challenge in the business.

With the 40,000 KES, she wants to purchase sacks of maize, beans, rice, green grams, ground nuts and lentils. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of maize, beans, rice, green grams, ground nuts and lentils.

loans.name: Munira

texts.en:
Munira is a married woman with five school going children. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. She has operated a firewood selling business for the past three years. She cites transportation costs as her major challenge.

With the loan, she wants to purchase more firewood for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more firewood for resale

loans.name: Philisila

texts.en:
Philisila is a married woman. She has six children. Three of them are in school, and the rest are adults. Philisila owns a house that has no electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

Philisila operates a cereal business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality.

With the 25,000 KES, she wants to purchase sacks of maize, beans, and rice for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of maize, beans, and rice for resale

loans.name: Erastus

texts.en:
Erastus lives in the Mariakani area a few kilometers from Mombasa, Kenya. He is a 48-year-old married businessman with three children. He has been in the furniture sales business for the last six years, and the business is doing great. He started the business from his own savings. 

He knew of Milango through friends, and now he seeks a loan to buy timber for making furniture.The major challenge for him in the business has been the prices. He hopes that his business will grow into a large manufacturer of timber products in the future. 

The extra income that he will raise will improve his standard of living, and he will buy a piece of land and settle his family.

loans.use: to buy timber for making furniture.

loans.name: Siah

texts.en: Siah is 38 years old and lives in the area of Kakata Town. She is single and also a high school graduate, with little income from her fiance who is a local businessman. She is determined to make their lives better by getting engaged in a small shop. Siah has been in this business for 6 year now, and she enjoys the flow of her customers. Siah is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks to enable her shop to become a bigger one. Her dream is to become a house owner.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Adama is 40 years old and married with 4 children between the ages of 4 and 15 years. She runs a domestic product business in Tombo, a Western rural area in Sierra Leone.

She's been in this business since 2007 and sells glass cups, knifes and food containers in her community.  She says that the main challenge in her business is location.

Adama requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone, to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and take care of her family. In the future, she would like to open a big shop. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale.

loans.name: Henry K Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from Kissy Town, near Freetown, Sierra Leone’s capital city. They have come to SMT to request a loan of 10,000,000 SLL (Sierra Leone leones) in order to meet their most immediate and most pressing financial needs, and at the end of each month, they can easily repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. It is their school’s bursar who is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf. 

Henry is the featured leader of this group. Henry is married to a housewife and has seven children who are attending schools and colleges. Henry has been a schoolteacher for 32 years now. He has requested  this loan in order to pay his children’s college fees.

loans.use: to pay his children’s college fees.

loans.name: Geghanush

texts.en:
Geghanush is a teacher with four years of experience teaching at a local school. She lives in Armavir with her husband and 6-year-old child. 

As a teacher's salary is not enough for covering family's daily costs, Geghanush also provides private classes at her house. Due to her hard work, Geghanush's classes are much in demand, and people want their children to attend her classes. Unfortunately, in Geghanush's house the conditions are not sufficient, and she is hardly able to accept her pupils. 

She has requested this loan so that she'll have an opportunity to purchase a table, four chairs, and a projector. She has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is highly important for Geghanush to be able to purchase tools specialized for her work. 

Geghanush is very grateful to lenders.

loans.use: to pay for a table, four chairs, and a projector

loans.name: José Alonso

texts.es: José vive junto a su compañera de vida y junto a sus tres hijos menores de edad, por quien José trabaja muy duro para salir adelante y proveerles todo lo necesario. José solicita un préstamo a FUSAI, con el cual pueda invertir en la contratación de luz eléctrica para su hogar ya que actualmente no poseen este servicio tan básico y necesario; así mismo desea reparar la fosa séptica de su casa debido a que sufrieron un problema de inundación por el mal estado que esta tiene, por lo que es de mucha urgencia repararla. De esta manera tanto José como su familia contarán con una mayor comodidad en su casa de habitación lo que los hará sentir mejor.
texts.en: José lives with his life partner and his three underage children.  He works very hard to get ahead and to provide his family with everything they need.  José requests a loan from FUSAI to spend on installing electric lighting in his house, where he and his family currently don't have this basic, necessary service.  He also wants to repair the septic tank at his house, which urgently needs repairs because its poor condition has caused a flooding problem.  This will make José and his family more comfortable in their home, which will make them feel better.

loans.use: to install electric lighting in his house

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a married, 26-year-old mother of a 3-year-old child in Thika. Veronica has been running a beauty salon for the past eight months with a monthly income of 7,300 KES which she uses to support her family. Veronica runs a grocery business too which supplements her income.

Veronica is applying for her first loan from KADET after she was introduced by an existing KADET client. She will use the loan to purchase weaves, braid, beauty products, a new blow-dry equipment etc. She will put the proceeds back into the business and use the rest to enroll her child in school. 

She hopes to purchase a motorcycle in future to venture into the transport business.

loans.use: To purchase weaves, braid, beauty products, a new blow-dry equipment etc.

loans.name: Kahindi

texts.en:
Kahindi is 25 years old and the father of one child who is currently studying in school. For the last three years, he has earned a living by selling goods and services in Malindi where he earns a monthly profit of 10,000 KES. 

Kahindi is applying for his second loan of KES 35,000 to purchase additional stock needed for his general store. He will purchase sugar, rice, flour and other items which he will sell for profit. He will use the profit from the business to pay for school fees for his child, sustain his family and expand the current business. 

Kahindi hopes to own his own charcoal depot in the future to improve his family's financial stability.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, rice, flour and other items to sell for profit.

loans.name: Violette

texts.en: Violette is 34 years old. She sells second-hand shoes and has been running this business for the past seven years. With the loan, she would like to buy more shoes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy more used shoes for sale.

loans.name: Sakovat

texts.ru:
Саковат 33 года. Она замужем. Ее муж уехал на заработки в заграницу. Пока ее муж находится вдали от семьи, Саковат одна воспитывает двоих сыновей в городе Исфара и одновременно занимается шитьём. 
Саковат несколько лет тому назад работала на рынке, продавала детскую одежду. Когда у нее родились дети, она не могла больше работать и прекратила свою деятельность. На сегодняшний день ее сыновья подросли -  старшему 5 лет, младшему 2 года. Саковат может снова работать и за детьми в ее отсутствии будет присматривать ее мать, которая живет вместе с ними. Саковат решила вернуться на свою старую работу и уже нашла место на рынке, где будет продавать детскую одежду. Все средства кредита пройдут на закуп сезонной детской одежды. Желаем Саковат удачи, успеха и побольше клиентов.
texts.en: Sakovat is 33 years old.  She is married.  Her husband left to work abroad.  While her husband is away from the family, Sakovat is raising their two sons alone in the city of Isfara and is concurrently involved in sewing.  Sakovat worked at a market, selling children's clothing, several years ago.  She could no longer work when she had children and stopped that business.  Today, her sons have grown up a bit - the oldest is 5 years old, and the youngest is 2 years old.  Sakovat can work again, and her mother, who lives together with them, will look after the children in her absence.  Sakovat decided to return to her old job and already found a place at the market, where she will sell children's clothing.  The entirety of the loan amount will be used to purchase seasonal children's clothing.  We wish Sakovat luck, success and more clients.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal children's clothing and restart an old business

loans.name: Edgardo Antonio

texts.es: Edgardo es una persona muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida trabajando como albañil, elaborando muros y otros trabajos similares, mientras no cuenta con un trabajo como estos, se dedica a coser pantalones y camisas. Desde hace siete años que reside en casa propia por lo que solicita un préstamo a FUSAI, con el cual pueda contratar el servicio de luz eléctrica y así mismo invertir en la compra del contador de luz. También desea finalizar un tapial el cual por falta de recursos no pudo hacerlo y gracias a este préstamo podrá invertir en la compra de todos los materiales de construcción necesarios y terminar este muro también conocido como tapial.
texts.en:
Edgardo is a very hard-working person. He makes a living as a construction worker, building walls and other similar projects. When he does not have one of these projects, he works sewing pants and shirts. 

For the last seven years he has lived in his own house, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI. With the loan he could get electric service and also invest in the purchase of an electricity meter. He would also like to finish an exterior wall that he has not been able to finish due to lack of resources. Thanks to this loan he will be able to invest in the purchase of all the necessary construction materials and finish this wall, also known as tapial or rammed earth.

loans.use: to purchase an electricity meter.

loans.name: Pricila

texts.en:
Pricila is a 53-year-old married woman. She has five children with ages ranging from 15 to 30 years old. She describes herself to be determined. She operates a farm where she keeps dairy cows that produce milk for sell and chicken which she sells to earn an income. She also grows crops like maize and beans for her own consumption and also selling. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. 

Her business is located in an area good for business, and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough money to boost business. 

She will use the KES 18,000 loan to buy animal feeds and farm inputs i.e fertilizer and seeds. Her business goal is to be the regional supplier of farm products within five years. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds and farm inputs i.e fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Ceberina

texts.en:
Ceberina is a 33 year old married woman. She has 3 children with ages ranging from 2 years to 17 years. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a tailoring shop where she offers tailoring services. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of transport. 

Ceberina will use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase clothes for resale. Her business goal is to have a wholesale clothing store within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will be a successful business lady. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.en:
Eleuteria is from the municipality of Duero. She is married with five children, ages 4 to 14. For four years, Eleuteria has farmed vegetables like tomatoes and eggplant. She barely earns an average income of 4000 PHP that helps meet her family’s basic needs. She is asking for a loan of 4000 PHP to buy fertilizer, seed and pesticides. 

She hopes that someday she can continue to improve and expand her business for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed and pesticides

loans.name: Francoise

texts.en: Francoise, age 36, sells fruit and has been in the business for the past five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more fruit for sale. The profits from the business will be used to increase her savings.

loans.use: To buy more fruit for sale.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёру 48 лет. Он со своей женой живет в городе Душанбе. Бахтиёр много лет занимался благотворительностью. Он помогал людям с ограниченными возможностям. Помогал и финансово и морально. Бахтиёр очень светлый человек с чистой душой. Во всех его делах и начинаниях его жена была рядом и поддерживала. Так же и сейчас, когда Бахтиёр хочет открыть авиа кассу. Чтобы Бахтиёр смог открыть собственную точку продажи авиабилетов ему нужно финансовая поддержка. Он уже многое преуспел, нашел место для аренды и сделал рекламу. Теперь ему осталось купить необходимую технику и оборудования для кассы. Бахриёр нуждается в поддержке. И Вы можете ему помочь.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is 48 years old.  He and his wife live in the city of Dushanbe.  Bakhtiyor had been involved in charitable work for many years.  He helped people with limited opportunities.  He helped them financially and morally.  Bakhtiyor is a very open person with a pure soul.  His wife has been close and supportive in all of his businesses and beginnings, just like now, when Bakhtiyor wants to open an airline ticket sales office.  Bakhtiyor needs financial assistance in order to open his own airline-ticket sales office.  He already accomplished a lot, such as finding a space for lease and making advertisements.  Now he has to purchase appropriate technology and equipment for the sales office.  Bakhtiyor needs support.  And you can help him.

loans.use: to purchase appropriate technology and equipment for his airline-ticket sales outlet

loans.name: Rene Alberto

texts.es: René es un joven trabajador quien es soltero y vive junto a sus padres. Él solicita un préstamo a  FUSAI, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para realizar el cambio de láminas en su casa, ya que estas están bastante viejas y enmohecidas, lo que permite que el polvo, la lluvia y el sol penetren a su hogar, lo que en algunas ocasiones ha hecho que algunos electrodomésticos se dañen, es por esta razón que el comprará láminas galvanizadas y así contará con una casa en mejor estado.
texts.en: René is a hard-working young man.  He is single, and he lives with his parents.  He is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to be able to have the money needed to change the zinc sheeting at his house.  It is pretty old and moldy.  This allows the dust, rain, and sun to permeate his household.  On some occasions this has caused damage to some of the domestic appliances.  That is the reason he will buy galvanized zinc sheeting.  That way he will have a house that is in better condition.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting to change the current roof.

loans.name: Petronilla

texts.en:
Petronilla is a married woman and has no children. She owns a house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past two years, she has operated a clothes-selling business, selling second-hand clothes for both men and women. She cites stiff competition as her major challenge in the business. 

Petronilla is requesting to borrow KES 25,000. She will use it to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop, in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha is a married woman, and she has five children, all of whom attend school. Asha owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Asha operates a cereal-selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality.

With the KES 40,000 loan, she wants to purchase sacks of maize for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of maize for resale

loans.name: Teofanes

texts.en: Teofanes is a 39-year-old married man and a father to four children ages 4 to 14. He is from Garcia Hernandez, Bohol.  For four years now, Teofanes has been engaged in a transportation business using his motorcycle (habal-habal). He also has been farming vegetables like eggplant and pechay (bok choy). He is asking for a loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. With this, he will be able to improve his farm and eventually his income. Teofanes has hopes of investing in other ventures someday to further augment his income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and seedlings

loans.name: Delmy Gladys

texts.es: Delmy es una joven trabajadora quien cuenta con grandes deseos de salir adelante por el bien de ella y su familia, ella trabaja realizando pupusas en su casa de habitación. Delmy solicita un préstamo a FUSAI, para poder comprar cemento, arena y todo lo necesario para repellar una pared de su casa que se encuentra en mal estado, así mismo para invertir en la compra de láminas para cambiar el techo de su casa el cual se encuentra muy deteriorado  y es de mucha importancia poder cambiarlo.
texts.en: Delmy is a hardworking young woman with a strong desire to get ahead, for her own sake and for her family.  She works making pupusas [stuffed corn tortillas] in her home.  Delmy requests a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, and everything else needed to repair a wall of her house which is in poor condition, as well as to purchase metal sheets to replace her roof.  The roof of her house is worn out and it is very important that she be able to replace it.

loans.use: to buy materials to repair a wall and the roof of her house

loans.name: Ana Violeta

texts.es: Ana es una madre muy responsable y trabajadora, ella vive junto a su compañero de vida y tres hijas menores de edad quienes se dedican a estudiar. Ana solicita un préstamo a FUSAI, con el cual pueda realizar el cambio del techo de su casa, ya que este está totalmente arruinado y picado, por lo que es muy urgente hacer este cambio, es por esto que con el préstamo adquirido, Ana invertirá el dinero para la compra de láminas galvanizadas, lo que le permita contar con una casa en mejor estado.
texts.en:
Ana is a very responsible and hard-working mother.  She lives with her life partner and three minor daughters, who go to school.

Ana is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to be able to change the roof to her house.  It is completely ruined and perforated.  That is why it is very urgent to make this change.
